page.title: 19RECREATION_SATURDAY CLUB
page.content: The Saturday Club starts at 10.30am and it finishes at 12 noon and I go every Saturday.If it is just a club session it costs 25p but if it something special like a film or a show, it costs 40p. When you join you get a membership card with a number on it and every week someone picks a number out of the bag. If it is your number you get some prizes like cars or posters or games. At the Saturday Club you can stay inside and make things like masks or sewing, or you can go in the sports hall to play games like rounders, basketball or tennis.During the school holidays Saturday Club is usually on every day of the week but not Saturday or Sunday. by Donna Atherton age 11
